title: 为什么我的菜单只有op才能打开求助
author: 1622784146a

replies.author: i方舟
replies.txt_content: 上面不是写了吗 你要给chestcommands.command.open权限

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content: 如图所示，给与权限 chestcommands.command.open

replies.author: 1622784146a
replies.txt_content: 求解答，只有开启op权限才可以点开我制作的菜单。是我的登录插件出了问题还是菜单插件出了问题？

replies.author: HYFan_Meng
replies.txt_content:
1622784146a 发表于 2020-1-6 15:44
求解答，只有开启op权限才可以点开我制作的菜单。是我的登录插件出了问题还是菜单插件出了问题？
需给予玩家权限组对应的权限

replies.author: i方舟
replies.txt_content:
1622784146a 发表于 2020-1-6 15:44
求解答，只有开启op权限才可以点开我制作的菜单。是我的登录插件出了问题还是菜单插件出了问题？
上面不是写了吗 你要给chestcommands.command.open权限
你用的是什么权限插件。

replies.author: Seac
replies.txt_content: 把chestcommands.command.open权限给Builder权限组，具体指令是/mangaddp Builder chestcommands.command.open

replies.author: gfjhf
replies.txt_content: 请问你用的是什么权限组插件

replies.author: 秦洪涛
replies.txt_content: 给权限呀，输入指令/mangaddp Builder chestcommands.command.open  或者/mangaddp Builder chestcommands.command.open.yml

replies.author: 凉凉丶
replies.txt_content: mangaddp 权限组(builder/default) ches.....(他提示的输入)

replies.author: www1246507084
replies.txt_content:
/mangaddp builder chestcommands.command.open 
把这个指令给出去就可以了

replies.author: Nazhi-
replies.txt_content:
管理员在游戏内输入
/mangaddp Builder chestcommands.command.open.yml即可打开菜单
输入/mangaddp Builder chestcommands.item.ldcd.yml即可使用菜单
不输入/mangaddp Builder chestcommands.item.ldcd.yml只能打开不能使用

replies.author: Jiangliuer
replies.txt_content:
要想玩家打开菜单，首先给与玩家打开菜单的权限，指令是：
mangaddp builder chestcommands.open.菜单名字.yml
